title: Thursday Post Show (04-08-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (04-08-21)
description:
Bobby welcomes everyone to the Post Show if you're new! Bobby takes a voicemail from a listener struggling on the decision to uninvite an uncle from her wedding. Bobby also gets called out on ranking nuts but not liking.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
